summary: A mixin that supplies a suite of testing utilities for TensorFlow vision encoder‑decoder models, handling configuration, input preparation, model execution, generation, attention and label outputs, as well as cross‑framework consistency and persistence checks.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to automatically verify the correctness, compatibility, and robustness of vision encoder‑decoder models across TensorFlow and PyTorch, reducing integration errors and ensuring reliable model deployment.
